titles: A just defence of the royal martyr, K. Charles I, from the many false and malicious aspersions in Ludlow's Memoirs and some other virulent libels of that kind.
author: Baron, William, b. 1636.
publisher: Printed for A. Roper ... and R. Basset ... and for W. Turner ...,
notes: Written by William Baron. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
